items.preText: Mushfiqur is getting some more attention from the physio, and some electrolytes too. Sarfraz complains to the umpires that he's taking too many breaks.
items.text: bouncer outside off and Pakistan concede more runs off the top edge. Can't control the hook and edges it to the right of fine leg
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: full on middle stump, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length ball angling in towards off stump. Defended with soft hands into the covers
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, driven firmly and extra-cover moves to his right quickly to stop it
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, defended back to the bowler, who offers a few choice observations after fielding the ball
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: fullish, angling into middle stump, clipped to midwicket
items.postText: Time for a change of voice. Here's Sreshth.
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.preText: Afridi is back. Thanks Karthik for that spell.
items.text: slower ball, back of a length on leg stump. He swivels to pull, but mistimes the shot to short fine leg
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: good length outside leg stump again, and he misses the leg-side flick. Hits his front leg and dribbles away to square leg
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mohammad Mithun, 1 leg bye

items.text: full on middle stump, and he comes onto the front foot to drive to mid on. They walk across for one
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short on middle, but he rides the bounce to pull along the ground. The ball goes to the sweeper fielder in the deep
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.preText: maddy: "Good teams double the the runs they score by the 30th over. Bangladesh will be over the moon if they can do that and get to 276. "
items.text: back of a length outside leg stump, and he rotates around his toes to paddle a sweep to deep backward square
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: big appeal for caught behind! But the umpire nods his head. Length ball outside leg stump, and he misses the flick off his hips. The ball hits his thighs and goes into the hands of the keeper.
items.postText:
Darshan Mandali: "@sreshth: please don't mention "Afridi is back". There will be many of us who can misunderstood it with shahid. " -- Hehe, I was going for that effect only. It's drinks now.

Forhad Hassan: "Mushi is now the 2nd highest runscorer in Asia cup 18"
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full outside off stump, and he drills a cover drive straight to the fielder. Technically correct shot, but finds the man
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length on middle, and he walks inside the line of the ball, before nudging this off his hips to square leg
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and he sticks his bat in front of his pads, and defends with soft hands
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: good length on off, and angling into his body. Fended off the front foot once again
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.preText: Mohammed Adnan: "@sreshth What pace is Junaid topping??" -- late 120s/early 130s in this spell
items.text: Back of a length outside off, and the ball soars over the batsman's shoulders. Gobbled by Sarfraz
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he clobbers this right over the non-striker! Picks the length up early, and smashes this into the long-on boundary
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: good length on middle, and he attempts to pull off the back foot. But the ball hits his body and dribbles away to square leg
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: back of a length from outside off stump, and he waits for the ball to come onto him, before opening the bat's face and dabbing this down to third man for the team 150
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full on his toes, and he clips this away with ease to the leg side. They're coming back for the second run, and it could be close because Mushi is struggling between the wickets but he manages to come back before Sarfraz whips the bails off. Sarfraz wants the third umpire to have a look, but the on-field ump has already made his decision
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: full just outside off, and he walks down the ground to defend. Comes off the bat's inside half, and rolls back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: mistimes the pull between midwicket and mid on. Wasn't short enough for that shot, and the batsman ends up splicing it on this occasion
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle, and the batsman lets the ball come onto his body. Fended with soft hands towards cover point off the back foot
items.postText: Mebs: "Maybe now is the time to bring a spinner back when they will be looking to accelerate"
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: wcpak: "Musfiqur Rahim is surely a legend in Bangladesh cricket..almost 9 out of 10 times he bails out his team from a difficult situation...never surrenders."
items.text: back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce to fend this with the bat's open face. The ball dribbles away to short third man
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run
